name: Keyboard Warrior - 2022 Kingston Game Jam
description:
Gamejam entry for Kingston 2022 - Mike Slape, Onur Sahin, Krzysztof Siatkowski

Welcome, Keyboard Warrior!

The lands need your help, they have been invaded by an army of animated skeletons! You must clear out these invaders using your w̴͕̉͑̃͌3̷̳̋̒̎̄̅a̶̡͎̪͉̬̤̐̇͛p̴̤͎̉͆̑͂͠0̴̨̤̗̱͋͌̕͘̚͠n̸̨̡̩̤̊͂̈̕̚ to send them ̵̪͚̻͗͌b̴̝̥̿̊̇ͅA̵̛̖͓̫͇͔͜C̴̮̆k̶̤̤̝͓̮̃ ̶̰̼̱̤̼̾͊͆t̶̡̟̿̌0̸̟̰̯̼̲͍̀̏̕ ̶͎̯͕͉̦̔͐͝ọ̶̟̒͒̎͌̕͝B̴̢͓͇̳͇͔̐͑̔͒̈̕l̶̹̇̚1̷͙̳͚͊v̶̨͖͇̽̀̑̌̐ͅȋ̴̼͖̤̀͗͗́͜0̸̪̫͚͙̻̥́̃́̉͠n̴̖̟̮̍͗̈́!

Please note: the aim reticule in the WebGL version was not fixed in time, so will appear as a large sprite. The Windows version does not have this problem and can be downloaded using the link.
